scripts.allinstall: npm run preinstall:be && npm run preinstall:web
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && mkdir ./dist && npm run build:be && npm run build:web && npm run cp
scripts.build:be: cd go-do-smth-backend && npm run build && cp package.json dist/
scripts.cp: cp -r go-do-smth-backend/dist/ dist/ && cp -r go-do-smth-web/dist/ dist/client
